metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3635 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel netfilter implementation in versions prior to 5.5-rc7. A user with root (CAP_SYS_ADMIN) access is able to panic the system when issuing netfilter netflow commands.

notes.Note: sbeattie> likely requires privilege to exploit
